channel.title: Exploring creating a curriculum for school with Axolotl?
channel.description:
Hi there,
I am an axoloti newbie, longtime synth tweaker, and a part time teacher.
I am exploring using the axoloti as a platform to introduce concepts of sound design, dsp, synthesis, programing logic, product design, at my sons school (middle school - high school) ...
Just wondering if any of you have done something like this and might be able to share your experience.
Thank you.

item.title: Exploring creating a curriculum for school with Axolotl?
item.dc:creator: @twinfin
item.description:
@twinfin wrote:

Thanks Janvantomme ... ill check your book out!

Read full topic
item.source: Exploring creating a curriculum for school with Axolotl?

item.title: Exploring creating a curriculum for school with Axolotl?
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

I have taught some workshops with Axoloti based on my book and it's a very good tool for explaining all of the concepts you mention. I mainly had adults participating in the workshops, but teenagers interested in technology should be able to work with the software.

Read full topic
item.source: Exploring creating a curriculum for school with Axolotl?
